text.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; fill: white; text-anchor: middle;

svg.text: Psychological manipulation techniques used to trick people into divulging confidential information or performing actions that compromise security

text.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; fill: white;

svg.text: सामाजिक अभियांत्रिकी के खिलाफ रक्षा रणनीतियां

svg.text: 1. Stop the action 2. Report immediately 3. Document incident 4. Assess damage 5. Implement countermeasures
• 98% of cyber attacks rely on social engineering (Proofpoint)
• Human error responsible for 95% of security breaches
Social engineering exploits human psychology - technology alone cannot protect against these attacks
